version_description:
• iOS8 compatibility
• Optimized blowing power for latest devices

• Birthday iMessage Stickerpack!
• iOS11 & iPhone X compatibility
• Optimized blowing power for latest devices

• BEAT mode: let candle & lighter flames dance to the music!
• AIRGUN mode: let flames shiver under gunfire!
• and… MORE blowing power on all devices!

Performance optimizations. New in V5.0:
• BEAT mode: let candle & lighter flames dance to the music!
• AIRGUN mode: let flames shiver under gunfire!
• and… MORE blowing power on all devices!
